generate_fastq_file_options.title: Generate FASTQ file options
generate_fastq_file_options.description: Options relating to FASTQ files that are generated within the pipeline that are realistic representations of sequencing data.

enable_fastq_files.description: Enable generation of FASTQ files for filesystem testing.

fastq_n_files.description: Number of GENERATE_FASTQ processes which generate a single FASTQ file.

fastq_n_reads.description: Number of reads to generate per GENERATE_FASTQ process.

fastq_read_length.description: Length of FASTQ reads to generate.

process_fastq_files.description: Whether to include FASTQ files in downstream file operations such as compress, archive, rename etc.

zero_file_options.title: Zero file options
zero_file_options.description: Options that are related to files that are generated within the pipeline composed entirely of zeros to be used for small file manipulation.

enable_zero_files.description: Enable generation of files from /dev/zero for filesystem testing.

zero_n_files.description: Number of miniature text files to generate from /dev/zero.

zero_file_size.description: Size of zero file to generate in megabytes.

process_zero_files.description: Whether to include zero files in downstream file operations such as compress, archive, rename etc.

run.description: Selectively run a tool. If this option is enabled only tools with this name will be ran. Note: this may affect downstream tools.

skip.description: Selectively disable a tool. If this option is enabled a tool will be ignored. Note: this may affect downstream tools.
